Segment.name: MCT
Segment.comment: To identify accessorial charges and define the range for which each charge is applicable

Field.name: SpecialChargeOrAllowanceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of special charge or allowance

Field.name: TariffValueCode
Field.comment: Code identifying how to apply or interpret accessorial charges

Field.name: RangeMinimum
Field.comment: The value specifying the minimum of the measurement range

Field.name: RangeMaximum
Field.comment: The value specifying the maximum of the measurement range

Field.name: RateValueQualifier
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: Rate
Field.comment: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: TariffReferenceFlag
Field.comment: Code signifying that printed tariff needs to be referenced for proper application of tariff rules or for further explanation of tariff data

Field.name: SpecialChargeDescription
Field.comment: Identification of special charge; this data element is used whenever an applicable code cannot be found in data element 150

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either MCT05 or MCT06 is present, then the other is required.
